name: Stuffed (itch)
description:
"Stuffed" is the story of Ellie, a little girl who is afraid of the monsters from her imagination. When she couldn't get to sleep her dad gave her a teddy bear which he says is special and will protect her during the night. Once she falls to sleep feeling safe her teddy (our protagonist) comes to life and must defend Ellie from her overwhelming nightmares.

This version is an Alpha that we show cased at Insomia60. There are bugs we are aware of. But if you do find any comment and let us know.
